title: Drug interactions in ER's common but preventable

title_detail.value: Drug interactions in ER's common but preventable

summary: In a recent study, 38 percent of patients discharged from the emergency department had at least one drug interaction resulting from a newly prescribed medicine. The study identified the most common prescription drug combinations that may result in a negative interaction.

summary_detail.value: In a recent study, 38 percent of patients discharged from the emergency department had at least one drug interaction resulting from a newly prescribed medicine. The study identified the most common prescription drug combinations that may result in a negative interaction.
